title: Dedicated to Rita Reys - Isn't It Romantic (Dutch Treat ^B069 HQ
description:
Yesterday, I heard Rita had passed away at 88. Lately she was a lot on my mind. So I re-listened here music and imagined how she would like to be remembered.
So it went from there to this and has become a very beautiful playlist.

A kind of soundcard in which I recognize Rita, seeking the attention needed to be able to radiate. So a lot of it, is with a live audience with lots of applause (she clearly deserves). Rita always being a real romantic at heart..... Enjoy,


Dutch Treat - ^B069 Isn't It Romantic (Rita Reys)

01 Rita Reys - I'm Gonna Sit Right Down And Write Myself A Letter
02 Rita Reys - Too Close For Comfort
03 Rita Reys - Isn't It Romantic
04 Rita Reys - Mr. Wonderful
05 Rita Reys - Moonlight In Vermont
06 Rita Reys - What's New
07 Rita Reys - Remember
08 Rita Reys - My Foolish Heart
09 Rita Reys - Where Or When
10 Rita Reys - Can't We Be Friends
11 Rita Reys - I Get A Kick Out Of You
12 Rita Reys - Tangerine
13 Rita Reys - I Remember Clifford
14 Rita Reys - Speak Low
15 Rita Reys - Thou Swell
16 Rita Reys - The Touch Of Your Lips
17 Rita Reys - Too Marvellous For Words
18 Rita Reys - That Old Feeling
19 Rita Reys - Cheek To Cheek
20 Rita Reys - Everything Happens To Me
21 Rita Reys - Over The Rainbow
